dc:title: The Incompatibility of Love and Violence
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Affirms that all men are brothers--a view shared by Communists and Christians alike. Disavows violent means of change and cites Peter Maurin's pacifism. Love requires suffering and the Cross is the path to joy and life.
